article:
My name is Liu Yuqing. I will never _ my first English teacher, Miss Yang, because I learned a lot from her. Miss Yang is a young woman. She has a round face _ big eyes. There is always a _ on her face.
She taught me English when I entered the school. When I first met her, I was _ and couldn't speak a word of English. She said to me, "Come on! Don't be shy. You can do it well." She always _ me with my English when she was free.
Every day, she prepared   her lessons _ before class. When she came into the classroom, she said hello _ everone. She tried to make every class _ . She had all kinds of activities in class and tried to make every student speak English. After class, if we had problems with studies or life, she would give us some _ .
With her help, my English _ a lot and she was very happy for me. Miss Yang is really a good teacher.
